segments.text: I see two kids trying to get cookies from that jar, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar, and his sister is waiting for him to pass her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice how determined they both look, like they've planned this whole thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and I'm afraid he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing right there, ready to catch him if he does.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know their mom is just a few feet away, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must think they're being so sneaky, but it's obvious what they're up to.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I also hope they don't hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a risky move, but I can't help but admire their teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR
